title: Tryndamere's Ultimate
body:
Here is his ultimate.

> **Undying Rage**
> COOLDOWN: 110 / 100 / 90
> Active: Tryndamere instantly gains Fury and becomes** immune to death for 5 seconds**, during which his health cannot fall below 1. Undying Rage **can be used even when affected by crowd control**.
> **Fury Gained: 50 / 75 / 100**
> If Tryndamere is **below 3% maximum health when Undying Rage ends, he heals to that amount.**

Is this ultimate OP in your opinion? I used to think otherwise, but atm imo it is, or at least I feel it's way too problematic to deal with.

I mean most teamfights rarely even last 10 seconds how come he gets access to a guaranteed 5 second immunity, guaranteed maximum damage and guaranteed HP refund on a somewhat short CD of 100 sec or so with 0 resource cost?

It's not like he has zero utility like say Yi who is quite useless beyond winning a match that he has already won, or Nasus who effectively needs a long time to properly ramp up and can not kill people on a second basis. Trynd on the other hand outside of his potential ridiculous damage, has a reliable gapcloser and an unreliable but powerful slow (and has a AoE AD reduction in it), all on top of his instant heal. 

I don't mind the rest of his kit THAT much, but the ulti definitely needs to get a look at.

It lasts way too long and costs too much to pin him in place and kill him properly. It's not like it's Sion's Passive where just kiting alone actually kills the damn thing, no you still have to somehow kill Trynd after devoting a huge chunk of your resource just to prevent him from 2 shotting your entire team (let's not mention he could just E away after ulti). You can't just burst him dead either, unlike again Sion's Zombie Run or Master Yi's Highdunker, or even Nasus's "I WIn" in some cases given if you have someone who scales well with BotRK.

Also, once he gets beyond 2 to 3 items, it becomes impossible to duel him without at least moving 2 to 3 people on him at once every single time.

That in my opinion, is quite BS.

**Knock 1 or 2 seconds from that ultimate, at the very least.**

Yes I agree with you, but Kayle ult only last for 2.5 or 3 seconds and targets any allied champion. Tryn is stronger because it's 5 seconds and provides him with 100 fury so when or just b4 his ult ends hit q gain 250/300 hp.(if still 100 fury)
I don't disagree.

I used to have an issue with Tryn when I mained top and versed him frequently. He'd always tower dive me and destroy me. His ultimate seemed to last too long, with a very quick cool down. But now I main support and jungler, and I verse him late game, and with a tiny bit of CC, he maybe kills one champion before being a free kill. So although I think his cool down on his ult could use maybe a tiny bit longer, I think his lack of ability in late game team fights on offence means he's more or less balanced.

That said, if anyone wants to argue he is degenerate, I will not argue against that. In lane I have felt his horror, so will not deprive anyone of a good gripe at the bugger.
